message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper presents a decentralized sensor-level collision avoidance policy for multi-robot systems using reinforcement learning. The paper focuses on the practical application of the policy in complex scenarios, which is a common theme in the Robotics (cs.RO) sub-category. The use of reinforcement learning and deep learning techniques to learn the policy suggests that it could also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the integration of the learning algorithm into a hybrid control framework, which could be relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Finally, the paper presents performance evaluations and generalization tests, which could be relevant to the Multi-Agent Systems (cs.MA) sub-category.
